short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamless call center management in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of your call center with the Alohaa Chrome extension. Designed to streamline your operations, Alohaa brings powerful telephony features right into your browser. Effortlessly manage calls, monitor agent performance, and access real-time insightsâ€”all without leaving your current tab. 

1) Signup with Alohaa, get a free or basic plan to try (if you are a new customer)
2) Exisiting customers simply install the plugin 
3) Login from agent account and start using it. 

Empower your team to deliver exceptional service with Alohaa at their fingertips.
